title: Vodka
alt: Or whatever's handy! I'm pretty much pure alcohol and water, so it doesn't really matter!
transcript:
[Ponytail and Megan sit together at a table with two small shot glasses on the table. Ponytail is imbibing from a large bottle, while Megan is cradling a relatively large glass.]Ponytail: Maybe this is the vodka talking, but:
Ponytail: Hi! I'm made from potatoes!
